original_text: The priests said not, Where is the Lord? and they that handle the law knew me not: the pastors also transgressed against me, and the prophets prophesied by Baal, and walked after things that do not profit.
korean_text: 제사장들은 여호와께서 어디 계시냐 말하지 아니하였으며 율법을 다루는 자들은 나를 알지 못하며 관리들도 나에게 반역하며 선지자들은 바알의 이름으로 예언하고 무익한 것들을 따랐느니라

sentences.original_text: and they that handle the law knew me not
sentences.korean_translation: 율법을 다루는 자들이 나를 알지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: the pastors also transgressed against me
and the prophets prophesied by Baal
and walked after things that do not profit
